synopsis.text: As the fictional band Irodorimidori takes the stage for their first concert, the members—Arishiana Agata, Nazuna Tennouzu, Nagi Kobotoke, Serina Akesaka, and Naru Hakobe—embark on a musical adventure that will forever alter their destinies. The band's debut single, "Change our MIRAI!", is the first in a series of songs inspired by Sega's popular Chunithm rhythm arcade game. As the girls' voices harmonize and their instruments blend together, they create a powerful sound that will inspire and unite them in their future musical endeavors. This is the beginning of a journey that will change their lives and the world of music forever.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
